nodes.text: The XA Classic bipod was a model of weapon bipod available in the time following the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. The mount was produced by Galactic Arms and sold for 100, being compatible with rifles, blaster carbines and light repeating blasters. When attached, it stabilised a weapon if deployed and increased its firing characteristics.
The XA Classic was first mentioned in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2014.
